Mike Pence said he made the final decision not to run for president Wednesday night. He and his wife told their two daughters and then called their son, who is in college, early Thursday. We just concluded that while we could seek the presidency, we concluded that our best opportunity to continue to serve the people of Indiana was either in Washington, D.C., or here at home, Mike Pence said. The worst mistake my country made when it finally transitioned into democracy, a full decade ago, was to keep most of the government bureacratic aparatus in place, as well as leaving intact the most corrupted parts of the previous regime's establishment, such as worker's unions. This eventually made it so that we now face the prospect of having the very same people ruling the country regardless of who wins an election...
